sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import ProjectCard from './ProjectCard'; const Projects = () => { const [selectedProject, setSelectedProject] = useState(null); const projects = [ { id: 1, title: 'Banking App', description: 'A secure banking application with advanced authentication and transaction management.', technologies: ['React', 'Spring Boot', 'MySQL', 'Tailwind'], image: 'https://via.placeholder.com/400x300/1e293b/ffffff?text=Banking+App', tasks: [ 'Implement JWT + OAuth2 authentication', 'Deposit/Withdraw functionality', 'Automatic validation for transactions ≤ 10k', 'Manual validation for transactions > 10k', 'Docker containerization' ] }, { id: 2, title: 'E-Commerce Store', description: 'Full-featured online store with payment integration and admin dashboard.', technologies: ['React', 'Tailwind', 'Node.js', 'MongoDB'], image: 'https://via.placeholder.com/400x300/1e293b/ffffff?text=E-Commerce', tasks: [ 'Product listing with search and filters', 'Shopping cart system', 'Checkout with Stripe integration', 'User authentication and profiles', 'Admin dashboard for product management' ] }, { id: 3, title: 'Crypto Tracker', description: 'Real-time cryptocurrency tracking with advanced features.', technologies: ['React', 'Tailwind', 'Coingecko API'], image: 'https://via.placeholder.com/400x300/1e293b/ffffff?text=Crypto+Tracker', tasks: [ 'API integration for live crypto prices', 'Search and filter coins', 'Favorites system', 'Dark mode toggle', 'Price alerts and notifications' ] }, { id: 4, title: 'Task Manager', description: 'Productive task management application with drag-and-drop functionality.', technologies: ['React', 'Tailwind', 'JavaScript'], image: 'https://via.placeholder.com/400x300/1e293b/ffffff?text=Task+Manager', tasks: [ 'Add, edit, and delete tasks', 'Priority levels and categorization', 'Deadline management', 'Drag & drop task reordering', 'LocalStorage for data persistence' ] }, { id: 5, title: 'Social Media Clone', description: 'Feature-rich social media platform with real-time updates.', technologies: ['React', 'Firebase', 'Tailwind'], image: 'https://via.placeholder.com/400x300/1e293b/ffffff?text=Social+Media', tasks: [ 'User profiles and authentication', 'Posts feed with infinite scroll', 'Like and comment system', 'Real-time updates with Firebase', 'Follow/unfollow functionality' ] }, { id: 6, title: 'Travel Booking Platform', description: 'Comprehensive travel booking system with admin management.', technologies: ['React', 'Tailwind', 'PHP', 'MySQL'], image: 'https://via.placeholder.com/400x300/1e293b/ffffff?text=Travel+Booking', tasks: [ 'Browse and search trips', 'Online booking system', 'Payment integration', 'User dashboard', 'Admin panel for trip management' ] }, { id: 7, title: 'Portfolio Website', description: 'Modern, responsive portfolio website showcasing projects and skills.', technologies: ['React', 'Tailwind'], image: 'https://via.placeholder.com/400x300/1e293b/ffffff?text=Portfolio', tasks: [ 'Hero section with animations', 'About section with profile', 'Skills showcase', 'Projects gallery with modals', 'Contact form with validation' ] }, { id: 8, title: 'Weather App', description: 'Beautiful weather application with detailed forecasts.', technologies: ['React', 'Tailwind', 'JavaScript'], image: 'https://via.placeholder.com/400x300/1e293b/ffffff?text=Weather+App', tasks: [ 'API integration with OpenWeatherMap', 'Search by city or location', 'Current weather and forecast display', 'Responsive design for all devices', 'Weather icons and animations' ] }, { id: 9, title: 'Online Learning Platform', description: 'Educational platform with course management and progress tracking.', technologies: ['React', 'Tailwind', 'PHP', 'MySQL'], image: 'https://via.placeholder.com/400x300/1e293b/ffffff?text=Learning+Platform', tasks: [ 'Course listing and search', 'User enrollment system', 'Admin CRUD for courses', 'Progress tracking', 'Certificate generation' ] }, { id: 10, title: 'NFT Marketplace', description: 'Decentralized NFT marketplace with wallet integration.', technologies: ['React', 'Tailwind', 'Web3.js', 'Ethereum'], image: 'https://via.placeholder.com/400x300/1e293b/ffffff?text=NFT+Marketplace', tasks: [ 'Display NFTs from blockchain', 'Wallet connection (MetaMask)', 'Buy/sell NFT functionality', 'Category filtering', 'Transaction history' ] } ]; return (

My Projects

{projects.map((project) => ( setSelectedProject(project)} /> ))}
{selectedProject && (

{selectedProject.title}

{selectedProject.description}

Technologies:

{selectedProject.technologies.map((tech, index) => ( {tech} ))}

Key Features:

    {selectedProject.tasks.map((task, index) => (
  • {task}
    • ))}
)}
); }; export default Projects;
